::Spears::
She noticed how he sounded down and tired of war.  She was feeling 
the same way, tired of war.  she looked at her side and noticed that 
the internal repair systems had some of the wound healed. She had 
stopped leaking fluid at least.  She walked over and put her hand on 
Striker's shoulder. "If we manage to get a whole 20 cycles to breath 
and unwind, mind if I join you in a holo-room work out?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker shakes his head. "My ship was completely destroyed, along 
with the 
> Predacon ship and the space station."
> 
> He also looks sadly out the window. "There have been so many 
Predacon attacks 
> recently, that I had no time for leisure. But when I do, I ussually 
train in 
> the holo-rooms."
